StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetO.cerWaiverTypes]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@WaiverCategoryID int AS
SELECT T.WAIVER_TYPE_ID, T.WAIVER_TYPE_SHORT_DESC, T.WAIVER_TYPE_DESC, COALESCE(T.WAIVER_TYPE_CONDITIONS, SPACE(0)) AS WAIVER_TYPE_CONDITIONS, T.WAIVER_CODE, T.WAIVER_LEVEL, T.EXCEPTION_TO_POLICY FROM OFFICER_WAIVER_TYPE T INNER JOIN OFFICER_WAIVER_CATEGORY C ON (T.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = C.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID AND T.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = @WaiverCategoryID) ORDER BY T.WAIVER_TYPE_DESC
